verses.name: Ezekiel 48:4
verses.text: And by the border of Naphtali, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Manasseh.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:5
verses.text: And by the border of Manasseh, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Ephraim.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:6
verses.text: And by the border of Ephraim, from the east side even unto the west side, a portion for Reuben.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:7
verses.text: And by the border of Reuben, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Judah.
